definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: You have reviewed the cash flow statement before investment decision is made.
sentences.chinese: 在进行投资决定前，你会先详阅综合现金流量表。

sentences.english: And at what rate do you discount those cash flows?
sentences.chinese: 现金流折现率又是多少呢？

sentences.english: TEPCO has a cash flow of 2 trillion yen.
sentences.chinese: 东电目前拥有约2万亿日元的现金流。

sentences.english: Analyze free cash flow discount method in the application of the applicability of our country;
sentences.chinese: 第三部分，自由现金流量折现法在我国的具体运用。

sentences.english: Let’s say you want to do a cash flow statement for the past year.
sentences.chinese: 比方说，你想建立去年的现金流量表。

sentences.english: Avoid negative cash flow at all cost.
sentences.chinese: 不惜一切代价避免负的现金流。

sentences.english: The company had $5.4bn of cash at the end of the second quarter.
sentences.chinese: 在第二季度末，联合科技现金流有54亿美金。

sentences.english: The three major U. S. auto giant is the cash flow is drying up and in serious danger together.
sentences.chinese: 美国的三大汽车巨头是现金流枯竭而举步危艰。

sentences.english: Therefore, free cash flow discount is the best measurement method for evaluation of enterprise value.
sentences.chinese: 因此，现金流折现法是衡量企业价值的最好手段。

sentences.english: But now the exit doors are closed and cash flow is king.
sentences.chinese: 但现在开溜的大门已经关闭，现金流主宰一切。

sentences.english: Strict cash-basis follows the cash flow exactly.
sentences.chinese: 严格现金基础的现金流量如下到底。

sentences.english: We are more concerned about the two indicators are asset-liability ratio and monthly cash flow.
sentences.chinese: 我们比较关注的两个指标是资产负债率和月度现金流。

sentences.english: The enterprise is obliged to pay the cash flow it receives to the final recipient in a timely manner.
sentences.chinese: 有义务将收取的现金流量及时支付给最终收款方。

sentences.english: Like so much in the world of finance, the cash flow statement is not straightforward.
sentences.chinese: 就像财务世界的很多东西一样，现金流量表也不简单。

sentences.english: A project will produce operating cash flows of $45000 a year for four years.
sentences.chinese: 一个项目每年可以发生45000的现金流。

definition: to be in debt/to incur debts/liability (finance)
